Text: I absolutely love your torrents. You're one of the few uploaders who put up classics and many of the treasured Criterion releases. I'm looking forward to more of the oldies. Also, a question: Do you have French subtitles for Engrenages? Perhaps a link?

Where I usually look for TV subs, there is no French subs for Engrenages.

http://www.addic7ed.com/show/2109

I use plain google for some subs I need, it goes like subtitles and after few clicks one can find if some subtitle exists at all.
"it goes like subtitles" = it goes like "name" "language" subtitles
